title: Add Vivan Pathak photo asset and feature it in hero section

requirements.summary: Add optimized/cropped versions of IMG_0098.jpeg as static web assets under frontend/public/assets/ for hero usage
acceptanceCriteria: An optimized/cropped version of IMG_0098.jpeg is saved under frontend/public/assets/ (or a subfolder) and can be loaded via a /assets/... URL in the browser.
The image is compressed appropriately for web use (reasonable file size) while maintaining good visual quality.

file_operations.description: Add the optimized/cropped hero portrait asset derived from IMG_0098.jpeg (web-compressed and sized for hero usage).
Add the optimized square portrait variant derived from IMG_0098.jpeg (web-compressed for smaller layouts where needed).

requirements.summary: Update HeroSection to prominently display Vivan Pathakâ€™s photo first while preserving the existing Air India Express-inspired responsive layout
acceptanceCriteria: On initial page load, the hero/top section prominently displays the new photo before other hero visuals (e.g., above the headline or as the main image in the hero).
The image includes appropriate English alt text (e.g., referencing Vivan Pathak as provided by the user) and does not cause layout shifts or overflow on common screen sizes.
The hero section still looks balanced alongside the existing headline, stats cards, and styling on both mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Replace the current primary hero image with the new Vivan photo as the main visual using frontend/public/assets/generated/vivan-hero.dim_1200x1500.jpg (and optionally use frontend/public/assets/generated/vivan-portrait-square.dim_800x800.jpg for smaller breakpoints). Add appropriate English alt text referencing Vivan Pathak, and adjust the hero image container sizing/aspect behavior to prevent layout shifts/overflow while keeping the existing theme styling and responsiveness.
